originalText.text: What a great experience! Booking was easy and Lorraine did an amazing job with my facial. You can tell she really cares about her clients and providing the best service tailored to your needs. She explained every step of the facial and I left feeling rejuvenated both physically and mentally! Will absolutely make this my regular spot.

You can tell she really cares about her clients and providing the best service tailored to your needs. originalText.text: My experience at Spa Beauty was exceptional! Not only does Lorraine provide great service and advice, she also makes the experience feel very personable. Over the last 2 months I’ve been dealing with some unusual acne/ breakouts, Lorraine was almost sure that she’d be able to help me clear my skin. She seemed so sure of herself I decided to pay her a visit, to which I am very grateful I did, I’ll definitely be going back. Highly recommend her! Thanks Lady!!!

text.text: My experience at Spa Beauty was exceptional! Not only does Lorraine provide great service and advice, she also makes the experience feel very personable. originalText.text:
Shout out to spa beauty unlimited for saving my life. She called me one day to check on me and to see when I was coming in for a massage after getting surgery. I didn’t even know anything was wrong. Once she saw my body I had to rush to the emergency room. I thank God for her always.

I finally got a massage from Lorraine and she made me feel so much better and look better. I am about to get my second massage today and I am extremely excited.

She loves what she does and she actually cares about her clients healing process. She gives amazing advice and she wants to see you look and feel better always.

She does eyebrows, post op massages and many more. Her skills and talent is amazing. Do not hesitate to book your appointment with her.

God bless your hands Lorraine.

originalText.text: Upon discovering Spa Beauty Unlimited, and seeing its lovely reviews, and the services they offered, I decided to contact them about some questions I had. When I first spoke to Lorraine, the owner and specialist of the business, she was so friendly and kind, she answered all my questions thoughtfully, and made me feel comfortable about entrusting my sensitive skin with her. During my appointment, she continued to be kind, friendly, and caring. And was very thorough with my skin. The extractions were a little painful, but she took her time in soothing and moisturizing my skin afterwards, and even gave me a small neck and shoulder massage. I waited a few weeks before writing this review to see how my skin would react to the facial, and I am happy to say that it reacted nicely. I had some redness after the facial, but by the next day it was gone, and my face remained clean, glowing, and hydrated. I would recommend Lorraine for anyone looking for a quality facial in a calm, clean environment, with a delightful person. Thanks Lorraine!

originalText.text: Took my daughter there for acne treatment,  she was very thorough and informative. Will absolutely continue treatment. I will be booking for myself in the near future .  10/10 will recommend.
